reviewText: This is a great movie. It was a definite must have for me and I love that this movie does not go along with the "happily ever after" theme. I have enjoyed it more than a few times it is my go to movie when I don't know what to watch. LOVE!!

We really enjoy looking at the movie it was something to let everyone know it can happen in real life.
thank you
This movie is great to watch it's get you wrapped up in the movie so much that you dnt want to blink lol it's a powerful movie with a great message
I watched this movie and want to see it again.  Excellent movie.  Love anything that Tyler Perry does.  Look forward to ordering more movies by Tyler Perry

In my opinion this film did not match the level of creativity and excellence of some of Tyler Perry's other work. This movie was very predictable with a story line that was similar to countless other films about romantic betrayal and consequences.  I found myself able to voice some of the dialog before it appeared.

I saw this at the movies when it  first came out this is a eye opener movie! Packaging was great it came before the date they says it would come! I watch the movie over and over message:if you have something good hold on too it! The grass not always greener on the other side! What looks good too you ain't always good for you! Watch it lll

Video was packaged, but did not go past the opening credits!  I tried cleaning it, etc however nothing worked.  Limited time contraints and a father with emergency cardiac surgery was the only thing that kept me from returning the movie for another copy.  Gret movie, but it does me no good if I can't watch it.
2 thumbs up for all cast members! This is what happens in real life. Tyler you rocked this one!

This film will have you on your toes the whole time. I was hesitant to watch it at first because of the crazy scary commercials that were made. I was afraid that cheating would be more than tempting with this film. BUT it was a great story, I mean it made cheating thrilling and attractive, but once you were hooked, the consequences rapidly came to your surprise. It truly helps to appreciate your spouse and not let temptation get the best of you, no matter how appealing it may be.
